TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XText extends System.Xml.Linq.XNode

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 元素可以包含文本内容。XML elements can contain text content. 有时候，内容是简单 （该元素仅包含文本内容），并且有时混合内容 （元素的内容包含文本和其他元素）。Sometimes the content is simple (the element only contains text content), and sometimes the content is mixed (the contents of the element contains both text and other elements). 在任一情况下，每个区块的文本表示为节点。In either case, each chunk of text is represented as an node. [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 开发人员将通常需要编写代码以使用任意[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]它们未创建的树。 developers will often have to write code to work with arbitrary [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] trees that they did not create. 如果你正在编写代码，必须使用[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]你不具有对控制创建的树，你应注意的某些行为节点。If you are writing code that has to work with [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] trees that you have no control over creating, you should be aware of certain behaviors of nodes. 当处理 XML 树节点级别的内容时，你应准备多个要彼此相邻的节点。When processing the contents of an XML tree at the node level, you should be prepared for multiple nodes to be adjacent to each other. 此外，你应准备为包含没有文本的节点。Further, you should be prepared for nodes that contain no text. 可以通过[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]方法来移除文本节点的内容。It is possible through [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] methods to remove the content of a text node. 但是，[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]不会自动删除节点。However, [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] does not automatically delete the node. 节点具有标识，并且可能很批注，因此[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]允许长度为零树中的节点。The node has identity, and might have annotations, so [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] allows for zero-length nodes in the tree. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用节点进行编程](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/18680d1c-6e7c-4645-8d53-27b5a96f2d3f)。For more information, see [Programming with Nodes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/18680d1c-6e7c-4645-8d53-27b5a96f2d3f).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不创建文本节点通过使用构造函数。You typically do not create text nodes by using the constructors. 在构造时，传递文本内容的时，会自动创建文本节点。When you pass text content when constructing an , text nodes are automatically created. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个包含文本节点的元素。The following example creates an element that contains a text node. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", "Some text"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Some text Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml Some text ```

summary.span: 从另一个 对象初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from another object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数是主要用于内部创建 XML 树的深层副本。This constructor is primarily used internally to make a deep copy of an XML tree.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property NodeType As XmlNodeType
public: virtual property System::Xml::XmlNodeType NodeType { System::Xml::XmlNodeType get(); };

summary.span: 获取此节点的节点类型。

span.span: Gets the node type for this node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为派生自的所有类包含属性，你可以编写代码进行操作的具体子类的集合。Because all classes that derive from contain a property, you can write code that operates on collections of concrete subclass of . 集合中每个节点的节点类型随后可以测试你的代码。Your code can then test for the node type of each node in the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个包含多种类型的节点的 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree that contains a number of types of nodes. 然后，循环访问树，并输出每个节点的节点类型。It then iterates through the tree, outputting the node type of each node. 请注意，`Child2`包含节点，隐式转换从字符串内容。Note that `Child2` contains an node, implicitly converted from the string content. ```csharp // Note that XNode uses XmlNodeType, which is in the System.Xml namespace. XDocument xmlTree = new XDocument( new XComment("a comment"), new XProcessingInstruction("xml-stylesheet", "type=\"text/xsl\" href=\"hello.xsl\""), new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", "attContent"), new XElement("Child1", new XCData("CDATA content") ), new XElement("Child2", "Text content") ) ); foreach (XNode node in xmlTree.DescendantNodes()) { Console.WriteLine(node.NodeType); if (node.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element) { foreach (XAttribute att in ((XElement)node).Attributes()) Console.WriteLine(att.NodeType); } } ``` ```vb ' Note that XNode uses XmlNodeType, which is in the System.Xml namespace. Dim xmlTree As XDocument = _ Text content For Each node As XNode In xmlTree.DescendantNodes Console.WriteLine(node.NodeType.ToString()) If node.NodeType = XmlNodeType.Element Then For Each att In DirectCast(node, XElement).Attributes Console.WriteLine(att.NodeType.ToString()) Next End If Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Comment ProcessingInstruction Element Attribute Element CDATA Element Text ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此节点的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of this node.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含此节点的值。

span.span: A that contains the value of this node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性将引发和事件。Setting this property will raise the and the events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取和设置此属性。The following example shows getting and setting this property. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", "Some text"); XText txtNode = root.Nodes().OfType().First(); Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value); txtNode.Value = "New text"; Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value); root.Value = "Newer text"; txtNode = root.Nodes().OfType().First(); Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Some text Dim txtNode As XText = root.Nodes().OfType(Of XText).First() Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value) txtNode.Value = "New text" Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value) root.Value = "Newer text" txtNode = root.Nodes().OfType(Of XText).First() Console.WriteLine(txtNode.Value) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Some text New text Newer text ```

span.span: An into which this method will write.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要用于在内部写入到 XML 树的方法通过。This method is primarily used internally by the methods that write an XML tree to an .
